Create a unique world with its own set of rules and customs that will captivate readers' imaginations. This can include elements such as magic, mythical creatures, and different cultures or societies.
Develop complex characters with distinct personalities, motivations, and backstories. This will help readers become invested in their journeys and care about what happens to them.
Use descriptive language to paint vivid pictures of your world and its inhabitants. This can be achieved through sensory details, metaphors, and similes.
Write a compelling plot that keeps readers engaged from start to finish. This may involve creating conflicts, obstacles, and twists that challenge your characters and keep readers guessing.
Consider using multiple POVs to give readers insight into different characters' perspectives and experiences. This can add depth and complexity to your story, and make it more engaging for readers.
